root.name: square()
root.description: Draws a square to the screen. A square is a four-sided shape with every angle at ninety degrees and each side is the same length. By default, the first two parameters set the location of the upper-left corner, the third sets the width and height. The way these parameters are interpreted, however, may be changed with the rectMode() function.

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: float: x-coordinate of the square by default

parameter.label: b
parameter.description: float: y-coordinate of the square by default

parameter.label: extent
parameter.description: float: extent of the square by default
